input.label: Device:
input.populatingSearch: | stats count | eval device="All devices" | eval address="*" | inputlookup append=t insteon_devices | search (category=5) OR device="All devices" | lookup insteon_device_types category subcategory OUTPUT category_name description | eval device=case(address=="*", device, NOT isnull(name), name, NOT isnull(address), address, NOT isnull(device), device) | stats count(device) by device, address

input.label: Location:
input.populatingSearch: search sourcetype=weather_info | stats count(source) by source | rex field=source "://(?<location>.*)"

search.query: sourcetype=insteon_plm category=5 `get_command_info` | search (command="*Heat*" OR command="*Cool*") (to="$form.device$" OR from="$form.device$") | eval hvac_action=if(like(command,"%Heat%"), "heating", "cooling") | transaction hvac_action device maxopenevents=2 endswith="cmd1=13" startswith="cmd1=11" | eval cooling_minutes=if(hvac_action="cooling",duration/60,0) | eval heating_minutes=if(hvac_action="heating",duration/60,0) | timechart sum(heating_minutes) as heating_minutes sum(cooling_minutes) as cooling_minutes | append [search sourcetype=weather_info source=$form.location$ | fields - _raw | eval temperature_c = (temperature-32)/1.8 | eval wind_chill_c = (wind_chill-32)/1.8 | eval temperature = $form.temperature_type$ | fields temperature ] | timechart sum(heating_minutes) as heating_minutes sum(cooling_minutes) as cooling_minutes avg(temperature) as temperature
